meanings.sent1: The library reissued the popular book for more people to borrow.
meanings.sent2: The record label decided to reissue the classic album on vinyl.
meanings.sent3: The magazine reissued the old edition with a new cover design.
meanings.sent4: The company reissued the product with updated features to attract customers.
meanings.sent5: The school reissued the student handbook with revised rules for the new semester.

meanings.sent1: The movie studio reissued the film in theaters for its anniversary.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to reissue the limited edition sneakers due to high demand.
meanings.sent3: The bakery reissued the popular pastry due to customer requests.
meanings.sent4: The band reissued their first album to celebrate their reunion tour.
meanings.sent5: The museum reissued the exhibition catalog for visitors to purchase.
